task_description:
# Meeting type field uses wrong property name

**Linear Issue:** [BUI-14](https://linear.app/builder-project/issue/BUI-14/meeting-type-field-uses-wrong-property-name)
**Priority:** High
**Status:** Backlog


## Description

**Bug Description:**
The Meeting interface uses startTime/endTime but the backend returns scheduled_date.

**Location:**

* frontend/src/types/index.ts (Meeting interface)
* frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx (line 211)

**Issue:**

```typescript
new Date(meeting.startTime).toLocaleString()
```

But backend sends scheduled_date, not startTime.

**Fix:**

* Update Meeting type to match backend schema
* Update all usages of startTime/endTime

**Priority:** Medium

patterns.backend_schema_pattern: Backend uses CamelCaseModel which auto-converts snake_case to camelCase in JSON responses
patterns.type_definition_pattern: Frontend Meeting interface should match backend MeetingResponse schema after camelCase conversion
patterns.date_formatting_pattern: Use toLocaleString() with options for consistent date/time display

existing_implementations.description: Backend Meeting model has scheduled_date (datetime) and scheduled_time (string | None). No endTime field exists.
